favourite.article: Wonderful words, I did not know this hymn but found it when I looked for the words to "It passeth knowledge that dear love of thine," another hymn telling of the amazing love joy & peace we have in Jesus. What a wonderful friend we have in Jesus.
I have always enjoyed this hymn...drawing closer to Jesus, my Best Friend...
Lord Jesus I love You! Lord You are more than all the world to me!!!! Thank You Lord for Your love toward us!!! Blessed be His name forever!!!!!
Because of this we need not avoid the thought of our own death.
Does anyone know the new chords?
Our Lord Jesus is our real and faithful friend! never you can find a true friend in this world. He will be with us forever! Praise Him for His Wonderful love!
This song causes me to love You more, Lord! Thank You Lord, You are my best friend!
I've searched through many hymnal sites and finally found this hymn! Thanks for sharing. A beautiful hymn and a constant reminder.
Amen! I have a FRIEND, whose faithful love is more than all the world to me! LORD JESUS YOU ARE MORE THAN ALL THE WORLD TO ME!

As a young person this song supplied me richly with Love for our Lord. When I got older and a good friend had past away a brother reminded me of this hymn. He saved me. Blessed be His name. Lord Jesus, we love You. Come quickly, Lord.
Blessed be His Name!!!!! Lord Jesus!!!!
